reviews.review_msg: Taking this DE. Being a psych major almost everything in this course has been taught to me already :) online discussions are a little unclear & not your typical set-up, but still manageable. Minimal work required & the course requirements are pretty split up so it's easy to do well!
Excellent instructor.  Not a course for slackers.  She went to Yale!  Focus was on chem. Very engaging,empirically focused and extremely flexible.
